description:
<p>The post holder will be a key member of the Primary Care Team working on the development and implementation of key areas of the CCG’s Primary Care strategy and will have a particular focus on primary care premises developments and additional roles for Primary Care Networks. The post holder will need to work autonomously on a number of projects. This will include developing and engaging on proposals for service change, producing business cases, service specifications and performance monitoring systems. The role is employed by Greater Huddersfield CCG but will also cover designated project for North Kirklees CCG.</p>
<p>Applicants should have experience of working with General Practice, of communicating effectively with external stakeholders and of managing projects to achieve successful outcomes</p>
title: Primary Care Manager
